Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
05.07.2012 JH SCR16958 Added test on ADMN_CURRENCY of BDCL must be equal to ADMN_CURRENCY of BADP
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)

26.07.2007 SH SCR11925 Adjusted argument list of client selection program
08.09.2005 SH SCR9029 Fixed bug with calc of total amount
19.08.2003 SH SCR4127 Added test --> BDCL_AMOUNTACCCURR must be <>0
26.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- If button OK is pressed and the payment amount is not fully
handled give message to users

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BDCL_AMOUNTACCCURR) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BDCL where BDCL_BADP_ID = :2 for fetch only

-- Update keyfields
